data.prayer: Father, help your children in Mullaitivu, Sri Lanka find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mullaitivu, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Mullaitivu an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 90 believers in Mullaitivu, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Mullaitivu.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Rodiya people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, encourage your church in Mullaitivu that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Mullaitivu, Sri Lanka to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 90 believers in the state of Mullaitivu to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

location.name: Mullaitivu
location.people_groups_list: Sayyid, Pashtun, Pathan, Radayo, Sindhi (Muslim traditions), Yadav (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sayyid (49,000), Pashtun, Pathan (41,000), Radayo (1,700), Sindhi (Muslim traditions) (1,000), Yadav (Hindu traditions) (7,300)
